data.eml:eml: A revision of the generic position of Typton australis Bruce, 1973 (Decapoda: Palaemonidae: Pontoniinae), with a new diagnosis for the pontoniine shrimp genus Onycocaridella Bruce, 1981

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marin, Ivan (2008): A revision of the generic position of Typton australis Bruce, 1973 (Decapoda: Palaemonidae: Pontoniinae), with a new diagnosis for the pontoniine shrimp genus Onycocaridella Bruce, 1981. Zootaxa 1897: 64-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184464
